JobTitle: Manager/Sr Manager, B2B Marketing (B2B Perceptions of Coverage & Industry Activation)
JobFullDesc:
The U.S. Merchant Marketing organization sits within Global Merchant Services (GMS) and is dedicated to bringing buyers and sellers together and transforming how American Express is welcomed.  It is responsible for partnering with key stakeholders to drive profitable growth, accelerate merchant acceptance, and enhance the value of Amex acceptance to merchants and Card Members at scale. This role sits on the Perceptions of Coverage and Shop Small team which is focused on driving Card Member demand and spend across industries to grow perceptions of coverage and demonstrate the Enterprise value of accepting American Express.
The Senior Manager/Manager will develop B2B industry activation strategies with compelling marketing campaigns, fueled by insights, to change Card Member perceptions about where they can use their card and select American Express as their go-to payments provider. The colleague will collaborate closely with Enterprise partners to execute on these strategies and act as the US Merchant Marketing expert in cross-functional capacities. This is an exciting opportunity to play a pivotal role in developing B2B strategies, think creatively, and foster key partnerships across the Enterprise.  The successful candidate will be energized by the opportunities ahead, enjoy fostering relationships, and effectively manage multiple projects. 
Responsibilities:

Evolve and execute the B2B Perceptions of Coverage marketing strategy to drive more demand and diversify spend with business Card Members including offer development and go-to-market strategies 
Partner with Global Commercial Services to identify industry opportunities including offer constructs and marketing plans 
Uncover new opportunities to connect merchants with Card Members and amplify merchant value including: new placements for merchant recommendations, industry messaging in Amex.com channels, and integration of contextual coverage claims in Card Member communications   
Contribute to US Merchant Marketing’s overall B2B strategy workstream such as connecting buyer and supplier marketing plans 
Own monthly team scorecard with an eye for continually evolving insights and metrics

 
Minimum Qualifications

5+ years of experience developing and executing marketing strategies, with proven ability to seize opportunities and take a point of view on industry trends
Strong collaborator and self-starter with a track record of success in building relationships and influencing stakeholders at all levels  
Excellent communicator with ability to understand different audiences, structure presentations, and deliver key messages to effectively inform and persuade
Ability to analyze data and insights to make informed decisions
Demonstrated project management skills with proven record of managing multiple projects at once and driving successful delivery 
Enjoys thinking creatively and able to navigate ambiguity effectively 
AXP marketing experience a plus
